abstract.text: A bitmap class that stores and manipulates pixel data using a buffer of unsigned integers.
The bitmap supports operations like filling, updating, and merging pixel data.

inlineContent.text: The bitmap uses a row-major layout for pixel storage.
The bitmap can either own its buffer or be bound to an external buffer.
When bound to an external buffer, the bitmap does not manage the buffer’s lifecycle.

abstract.text: Reduces the opacity of all pixels in the mask by applying a scaling factor.
The buffer that stores the pixel information.
A boolean value indicating whether the buffer is shared with other instances.
Increases the opacity of all pixels in the mask by applying a scaling factor.
